definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Produces food of high quality accding to stard recipes.
sentences.chinese: 按照標準菜譜製作高質量的食品。

sentences.english: Mama Sinatra has promised to send the recipes.
sentences.chinese: 辛納屈的媽媽答應寄來菜譜。

sentences.english: Mei Yun's mom ask Mei Yun to bring the recipe to the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽讓美雲把菜譜拿到廚房裏來。

sentences.english: Eat as much as you like of the above food items.
sentences.chinese: 上面菜譜中的你喜歡喫多少就喫多少。

sentences.english: When I'm not researching ancient calligraphy, I will study Spanish seafood recipes.
sentences.chinese: 在研究趙孟順小楷之餘研究西班牙海鮮菜譜。

sentences.english: It is actually a domestication of a classic Venetian recipe.
sentences.chinese: 實際上這源於一個經典威尼斯菜譜。

sentences.english: Ha ha, however I made out the menu of the dinner on new year's eve with my parents yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 呵呵，昨天還是纏着他們把年夜飯的菜譜搞定了。

sentences.english: I need to prepare a gourmet menu that's going to be mind-blowing .
sentences.chinese: 我要準備一份能令人振奮的美食家菜譜。

sentences.english: Successfully cooking a meal with no idea what the recipe is.
sentences.chinese: 在不知道菜譜的情況下成功地做了一頓飯。

sentences.english: The recipe says that we should dissolve a cup of sugar in two cups of water.
sentences.chinese: 按照菜譜，我們應當在兩杯水中溶解一杯糖。

sentences.english: I always learn to cook by using recipes, but I'm still a poor cook.
sentences.chinese: 我總是靠菜譜來學烹飪，但至今我做菜還是很差。

sentences.english: A Pattern solution knits many patterns together, using a recipe.
sentences.chinese: 模式解決方案使用菜譜將很多模式組合到一起。

sentences.english: Using a computer is just like following a recipe. But you can't eat it afterwards!
sentences.chinese: 學電腦和看菜譜其實差不多，只是之後你不能喫罷了。

sentences.english: You could get her a microwave cookbook.
sentences.chinese: 你可以送她一本微波爐菜譜。

sentences.english: This recipe book show us the common practice of the cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 這本菜譜書向我們展示了市面上粵菜通行的做法。

sentences.english: Thrushes are a protected species so you will not find them on any menu .
sentences.chinese: 鶇鳥是受保護的物種，在菜譜上是找不到的。

definition: a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
to spend effort/to take trouble/May I trouble you to...? (as part of polite request)/Please would you mind...?
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
